Ingredients.1: 1 (9 ounce) package spinach and cheese tortellini (such as Three Bridges® Tortellini)

Ingredients.2: 1 (4 ounce) jar pesto (such as Three Bridges® Pesto)

Ingredients.3: 0.25 cup halved, seeded, and sliced English cucumber

Ingredients.8: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook tortellini in the boiling water until they float to the top, 5 to 7 minutes. Drain water. Place in the refrigerator to cool, about 15 minutes.

Directions.2: Layer pesto, cucumbers, tomatoes, onions, tortellini, and mache into the canning jar; season with salt and pepper.
